about_the_game:
🍌 Unpeel the Madness! 🍌

In a world where bananas aren’t just for breakfast anymore, we bring you the most a-peel-ing update ever—bananas as deadly weapons! That’s right, arm yourself with the ultimate fruit of fury in our latest free DLC.

Watch as Grace skillfully hurls bananas at her foes. Don’t question the logistics—it's fantasy, and in our world, bananas pack a serious punch. We’re the devs, we make the rules, and our rules say bananas are lethal. 🍌💥

So, grab this outrageously silly DLC and go absolutely bananas in Firestone! Because nothing says 'epic battle' like defeating darkness with the power of potassium!


Note: To toggle the banana attack, go to Magic Quarter, select the guardian Grace and click the toggle. You can revert to the original attack at any time in the same way.
